title: Formal Letter Generator
original_prompt: Write a formal letter in the given format to the recipient mentioned in the prompt. The letter should include the sender's address, date, recipient's address, subject, salutation, body, complimentary closing, and signature. The body of the letter should be divided into three paragraphs. In the first paragraph, introduce yourself and the purpose of writing the letter. In the second paragraph, provide details of the matter. In the third paragraph, conclude by mentioning what you expect from the recipient. Use formal language and a polite tone throughout the letter.
input1:
Sender's Address: 123 Main Street, Springfield, IL 62701  
Date: October 15, 2023  
Recipient's Address: Mr. John Smith, 456 Elm Street, Springfield, IL 62702  
Subject: Request for Collaboration on Community Project  
Salutation: Dear Mr. Smith,  
Body: I hope this letter finds you well. My name is Jane Doe, and I am the project coordinator for the Springfield Community Development Initiative. I am writing to discuss a potential collaboration between our organizations that could greatly benefit our community.  
In recent months, we have been working on a project aimed at enhancing local parks and recreational facilities. We believe that your expertise in urban planning and community engagement would be invaluable to the success of this initiative. We would like to invite you to a meeting to explore how we can work together to achieve our common goals.  
I look forward to your positive response and hope we can schedule a meeting at your earliest convenience. Thank you for considering this opportunity for collaboration.  
Complimentary Closing: Sincerely,  
Signature: Jane Doe

Subject: Proposal for Research Partnership  

Dear Dr. Johnson,  

I am writing to introduce myself; my name is Michael Brown, and I am a researcher at the Lincoln Institute of Technology. The purpose of this letter is to propose a partnership for a research project that aims to explore innovative solutions in renewable energy. Given the pressing challenges we face in this area, I believe that collaboration could yield significant benefits for both our institutions and the broader community.  

Our team has identified several key areas where your research on sustainable technologies aligns perfectly with our objectives. We are particularly interested in your recent work on energy-efficient systems and believe that by combining our resources and expertise, we can make significant advancements in this field. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss this proposal further and explore potential avenues for collaboration, including joint funding applications and shared research initiatives.  

I am hopeful that you will consider this partnership and look forward to your response. Please let me know a convenient time for us to meet and discuss this exciting opportunity. I am eager to hear your thoughts and explore how we can work together to advance our shared goals in renewable energy research.  

Best regards,  

Michael Brown
